title: UCI Jury Fines French Rider for Stopping to Kiss Wife, Son during Time Trial at Tour de France
content:
French rider Julien Bernard receives 200CHF fine for show of affection during the middle of Friday's time trial stage at the Tour de France.

Read the full article at UCI Jury Fines French Rider for Stopping to Kiss Wife, Son during Time Trial at Tour de France on Velo.
author: ahood
